Module deliverif.app
Package deliverif.app.controller.Observer

Class Observable

java.lang.Object
deliverif.app.controller.Observer.Observable
Direct Known Subclasses:
TemplateTSP, Tour, TourGenerator
public abstract class Observable
extends java.lang.Object
Allow an object to notify it's subscribers whenever an event occurred
